title: Nintendo Switch 2 Announcement Unlikely Before 2025?? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.05.24
description:
Phasmophobia is out now PS5, PS VR2, and Xbox Series X|S on October 29.
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10005673 
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/phasmophobia-game-preview/9N6D60SBZN05/0010 

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first months.

Nintendo Switch 2’s announcement might not come until next year, Star Wars Outlaws is promising big changes, and Assassin’s Creed wants to tell a good modern story again.

- Start spreading the news, Greg's leaving this week. He wants to be a part of it -- the Limited Run Games and Shopify Pop-Up in New York City! That's right, Greg's meeting and greeting in the Big Apple from 10 am to 6 pm Saturday. Kevin Smith, Jason Mewes, and Jared Petty will also be there, but more importantly, so will The Game Awards 2015 Trending Gamer. RSVP for Saturday at kindafunny.com/nyc!
- Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
   - GAMESCAST - is our Life is Strange Spoilercast
   - The STREAM is a sponsored Death Note: Killer Within stream
- If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
   - You can get today’s Gregway
